hub (e.g. of traffic network), hinge, pivot, fulcrum

exm.mng: lit. a door hinge never becomes worm-eaten, constant activity prevents decay (idiom)

exm.pyn: liú shuǐ bù fǔ , hù shū bù dù

alpha Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
